name: Score More Balls!
description:
Score More Balls is an isometric puzzle challenge. 

The goal of the game is building connecting groups of balls and removing them from the playfield. 

Swap the balls to create a single-color group.  Once you have a 5 balls (or larger) group which reaches the scoring area you can select the group and remove them by pressing the Score button. 

New balls spawn after each action! 

If there's no room to spawn a new ball, the game is over!
